attr.title: Bumpers & Broadswords Tournament
attr.desc:
BUMPERS & BROADSWORDS: TOURNAMENT is a Yu-Gi-Oh!-style tournament-based RPG - explore the open-world-ish city, collect roughly 60 different types of Warriors/Magicians/Beasts/Machines/Etc... to slam against each other and win the Championship!

Each Bumper has its own special effect, so choosing 4 that have a powerful synergy is vital.
